column4: hi guys, i have arch installed and i've installed ubuntu rigth now. I used the same /swap, /home and /boot partition for both arch and ubuntu. now i'm editing grub to get access to ubuntu and i was folllowing this tip: https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Grub#Dual_booting_with_GNU.2FLinux but i don't know what is the initrd /path/to/initrd and kernel /path/to/kernel  either
huh? there are links to initrd and the kernel (vmlinuz) in the root directory /
